name: Dragonborn Knight
description:
Choose a career, immerse yourself in the fantasy world of Borisland, follow the legendary heroes and become a new Legend. The devil has set their sights on crushing the land and destroying everything once and for all. Fight for your home! Unite Humans, Elves, Bloodborn, and Dragonborn to save the world from darkness!
[Unique Dragon transform System]
You will be able to transform into a dragon and take down all murderous enemies. Harness the power of dragons and use them wisely to face different dilemmas!
[Battle Pets]
Battle Pets are your most loyal companions. In the heat of battle, they will always be right by your side! Different Battle Pets provide helps in different ways. Utilize their features and make  strategic formations to help you overcome all kinds of situations.
[Relic System]
Relics can tell you about the history of the land and the keys to save it. To collect the lost relics，you have to cooperate with other races and find out the stories behind.
[Boss Hunts]
Hunting monsters is the main way of getting equipment and crafting materials. You can kill world boss alone in the Hell’s Gate and other dungeons, or you can team up with friends to defeat instant boss in Trollfells
[Massive PVP Battles]
This game allows you to fight together with millions of players worldwide in the Hall of Heroes. Royal Arena provides a fair place for players of different careers to fight against each other. Fields of Glory is a place where 2v2 battles are conducted.
We all have a superhero inside, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. Join now to embark on the epic journey with us!
